details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.4 Version and conformance level identification - Part number.
details.description: The value of "pdfaid:part" shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms

rule.description: The value of "pdfaid:part" shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms

error.message: The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of 2 for PDF/A-2 conforming file
